product_name: Petzl OK Oval Screwgate Locking Carabiner
long_description: The symmetric shape of the Petzl OK Oval Screwgate locking carabiner makes it especially useful when rigging hauling systems. Many pulleys require an oval-shaped carabiner in order to properly equalize loads when hauling; oval carabiners are also great for general use at belays. Key lock nose won't snag on pro, ropes or slings, making the 'biner simple to clip. Manual screwgate system features red band indicator to show carabiner is unlocked, providing a quick visual safety check.
short_description: The symmetric shape of the Petzl OK Oval Screwgate locking carabiner makes it especially useful when rigging hauling systems.
